For C4 crops (e.g. Rice), Radiation Use Efficiency is increasing with CO~2~ concentration ($C$, ppm) with a factor ($f_{c}$) according personal communications with Mark Howden.

$$
f_{c}=0.000143 \times C + 0.95
$$
